front.title: IEEE Standard for Verification of Vital Functions in Processor-Based Systems Used in Rail Transit Control

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A set of standard verification tasks for processor-based equipment used in safety-critical applications on rail and transit systems is covered. This standard also covers processes that verify the level of safety achieved in the implementation of safety-critical functions that are required to be fail-safe. Quality assurance or validation processes that affect the overall level of system safety are not covered.
